## üìä Data Type

What type of data are you adding?

- [ ] **Switch** - New mechanical switch
- [ ] **Keycap Set** - New keycap profile or set
- [ ] **Keyboard Layout** - New layout configuration
- [ ] **Vendor/Source** - New component vendor
- [ ] **Other**: ___________

## üîò Switch Information (if applicable)

**Basic Information:**
- **Name**: [e.g. Cherry MX Black]
- **Brand**: [e.g. Cherry]
- **Type**: [Linear/Tactile/Clicky]
- **Color Code**: [Hex color for visual identification]

**Specifications:**
- **Actuation Force**: ___ grams
- **Bottom Out Force**: ___ grams
- **Actuation Distance**: ___ mm
- **Total Travel**: ___ mm
- **Spring Type**: [Progressive/Linear/Other]
- **Housing Material**: [Nylon/Polycarbonate/POM/Other]
- **Stem Material**: [POM/Nylon/Other]

**Characteristics (Rate 0-10):**
- **Tactility**: ___ (0 = linear, 10 = very tactile)
- **Clickiness**: ___ (0 = silent, 10 = very clicky)
- **Smoothness**: ___ (0 = scratchy, 10 = buttery smooth)
- **Weight**: ___ (0 = very light, 10 = very heavy)
- **Sound**: ___ (0 = silent, 10 = loud)
- **Stability**: ___ (0 = wobbly, 10 = rock solid)

**Additional Info:**
- **Release Year**: ___
- **Popularity**: [Niche/Popular/Very Popular/Legendary]
- **Availability**: [Common/Limited/Rare/Discontinued]
- **Price Range**: [Budget/Mid/Premium/Luxury]
- **Best For**: [Gaming, Typing, Office work, etc.]
- **Not Recommended For**: [Quiet environments, etc.]
- **Variants**: [List any variants or similar switches]

## ‚å®Ô∏è Keycap Information (if applicable)

**Profile Information:**
- **Profile Name**: [e.g. Cherry, SA, DSA]
- **Height**: ___ mm
- **Top Surface**: [Cylindrical/Spherical/Flat]
- **Sculpted**: [Yes/No]
- **Manufacturers**: [List known manufacturers]

**Set Information:**
- **Set Name**: [e.g. GMK Olivia]
- **Material**: [ABS/PBT/POM/Other]
- **Compatibility**: [MX Style/Topre/Alps/Other]
- **Layout Support**: [ANSI/ISO/JIS/Other]
- **Price Range**: [Budget/Mid/Premium/Luxury]

## üéπ Layout Information (if applicable)

**Layout Details:**
- **Layout Name**: [e.g. Alice, Arisu, Ortholinear]
- **Key Count**: ___ keys
- **Category**: [60%/65%/75%/TKL/Full/Custom]
- **Special Features**: [Split, Ortho, Staggered, etc.]
- **Difficulty Level**: [1-5]

- **Vendor Name**: ___
- **Website**: ___
- **Shipping Regions**: [US, EU, Worldwide, etc.]
- **Specialties**: [Switches, Keycaps, Cases, etc.]
- **Price Range**: [Budget/Mid/Premium/Luxury]
- **Availability**: [In Stock/Pre-order/Group Buy]

## ‚úÖ Data Quality Checklist

- [ ] All required fields are filled out
- [ ] Information is accurate and verified
- [ ] Sources are provided for verification
- [ ] No duplicate entries (checked existing database)
- [ ] Specifications are in correct units
- [ ] Ratings are on the correct scale (0-10)
